name: phoenixd-dashboard
description: Phoenixd Dashboard - Lightning Network Node Management

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:backend
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check:frontend && npm run format:check:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "npm run test:watch --prefix frontend" "npm run test:watch --prefix backend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
